name: Brumalynx
printed_effect:
You can Nexus up to {frost}{frost}. When you do, you
can target a non-Stadium Rune. If it is face-up,
turn it face-down. That Rune cannot be Cast
as long as this Brumalynx is Enchanted.
(Its Enchanting Spirits are sent to the Underworld.)
effect: You can Nexus up to {frost}{frost}. When you do, you can target a non-Stadium Rune. If it is face-up, turn it face-down. That Rune cannot be played as long as this Brumalynx is Enchanted. (Its Enchanting Spirits are sent to the Underworld.)
